CANDIDATE 		Tejas Gujarathi
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location		Bracknell
QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor of Technology – Engineering Technology – The Birla Institute of Technology & Science – May 2021
Achieved 8.35 CGPA while taking up this balancing the challenges at work, personal life and the unplanned – unforeseen COVID pandemic (3 out of 7 semesters). His coursework was related to Cybersecurity Measures and Recommendations in an IT/OT environment. The measures were presented to customer, discussed, agreed, and implemented in an under-execution rail project in the UK.
Diploma for Higher Education in Industrial Electronics – Maharashtra State Board of Technical Education – Jul 2004

PERSONAL DETAILS
Location		Bracknell
QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor of Technology – Engineering Technology – The Birla Institute of Technology & Science – May 2021
Achieved 8.35 CGPA while taking up this balancing the challenges at work, personal life and the unplanned – unforeseen COVID pandemic (3 out of 7 semesters). His coursework was related to Cybersecurity Measures and Recommendations in an IT/OT environment. The measures were presented to customer, discussed, agreed, and implemented in an under-execution rail project in the UK.
Diploma for Higher Education in Industrial Electronics – Maharashtra State Board of Technical Education – Jul 2004
Achieved 7.2 CGPA. His coursework was to build a cost-effective hand-held metal detector. The existing marketized hand-held metal detectors started from ₹ 1500 and my intension was to build it in ₹ 1000. Successfully completed same in ₹ 1100.
Certifications
6σ (Six-Sigma) – Green Belt
Tridium Niagara 4 Technical Certification (Auth.ID: 190466977)
CAREER SUMMARY
Jan 2008 to date Honeywell (India / UK)
Positions:
From Jul 2019 Integration Specialist for Crossrail, Elizabeth Line
Mar 2018 to Jul 2019 Engineering Manager
Jan 2014 to Feb 2018 Delivery Lead
Jul 2010 to Dec 2013 Lead Engineer
Oct 2009 to Jun 2010 Senior Engineer
Jan 2008 to Sep 2009 HMI Lead
Roles & Responsibilities
Deliver exceptional guidance for key accounts such as Prisons, Network Rail, Public venues, Hospitality venues, Oil & Gas, Patient Care venues, Energy generation sector and many more.
Play crucial role in developing solutions for engineering for IBMS systems (HVAC, BMS, CCTV, Access Control, etc.). Assessing and implementing cybersecurity measures using CIS-CAT and VAPT tools.
Manage team of 15 people from organisation as well as sub-contractors.
Customised customer success experience to build brand loyalty.
Improve client consultations and determine needs through team management.
Apply effective upselling techniques to increase per-sale revenues or repeat orders.
Support operations in improving and resolving issues to deliver customer success.
Identify and assess linkages between system components and implement improvements to optimise connectivity, compatibility, and functionality to achieve value engineering as value to customer.
Encourage team collaboration and motivated individual employees through positive reinforcement and technical recognition.
Organise co-operative activities between service and projects teams for handover.
Evaluate quality of work and assess staff performance against set measurable objectives.
Compile projects reports for operational review.
Nov 2005 to Dec 2007 Transtech Automation and Consultancy (Manpower provider to Honeywell)
Position: Senior Designer
Roles & Responsibilities
Created design packages to drive on-brand initiatives and increase sales.
Created prototypes and mock-ups of products using various software packages.
Collaborated closely with clients to develop mock system and collect information for adjustments.
Consistently met schedules and deadlines for all illustration projects.
Mar 2005 to Aug 2005 Madusha Agencies
Position: Application Engineer
Roles & Responsibilities
Worked closely with developers, UX designers, and business and systems analysts to create cohesive finished products.
Tested equipment, machinery, and instruments to assess proper functioning.
Oversaw iterative design projects incorporating feedback from prototypes, manufacturing, and endusers for continuous improvement.
Studied manufacturing from engineering viewpoint to identify problems and potential improvements.
Jun 2004 to Feb 2005 Kuksons Electronics Pvt. Ltd
Position: Engineer
Roles & Responsibilities
Carried out all PLC programming work in compliance with relevant specifications. finished products.
Expanded technical skills through working alongside various Project teams doing PLC projects deployment.
Understanding design modifications done to eliminate machine and system malfunctions.
COMMENT
Responsible professional, passionate about delivering customer success. Offering 18 years of experience in system integrations and cross domain environment projects while keepi

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
